children.label: Accent
children.name: accent
children.help_text: Brand tertiary color or a highlight color.

children.label: Lines
children.name: line
children.help_text: This will set the color for dividers lines, table lines.

children.label: Page Body
children.name: body_color
children.help_text: This will set the color for general body of the website.

children.label: Normal State
children.name: normal_state
children.help_text: When the cursor is outside the anchor link.

children.label: Hover State
children.name: hover_state
children.help_text: When the cursor is over the anchor link.

children.label: Blockquote
children.name: blockquote
children.help_text: This will set the blockquote for the body text.

children.label: Padding Left
children.name: padding_left
children.help_text: Indent value or padding left of your text.

children.name: padding
children.label: Padding
children.help_text: Indent value or padding of your text.

children.name: marker_color
children.label: Marker Color
children.help_text: Color for numbers and letters in ordered lists.

children.label: Vertical Spacing
children.name: vertical_spacing
children.help_text: This lets you confirgure the padding top and bottom for sections.

children.label: Default Content Width
children.name: max_width
children.help_text: You will have the option default available when selecting the width of a module.

children.label: Medium Content Width
children.name: medium_width
children.help_text: You will have the option medium available when selecting the width of a module.

children.label: Small Content Width
children.name: small_width
children.help_text: You will have the option small available when selecting the width of a module.
